Overview of the methods
=======================

**blabla**

**CLIFF** integrates cell subtype abundance and expression with bulk drug sensitivity to infer the cell subtypesâ€™ drug susceptibility. CLIFF relies on a new mathematical model using cell-subtype- associated latent variables, which we resolve with an Expectation-Maximization algorithm. 

.. image:: images/cliff_schemes3.png

:ref:`detailmethods`
